mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_version ( product_id, version, effective_date, is_current, organization_id, tenant_id, plans ) VALUES ( #{product_id}, (SELECT ifnull(max(r.version),0) FROM product_version r WHERE r.product_id = #{product_id} AND r.organization_id = #{organization_id}) + 1, #{effective_date}, 'N', #{organization_id}, #{tenant_id}, #{plans} )
